
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/chenshibao/p/18947443" title="发布于 2025-07-01 10:22">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">芯片测试中的LDO 电压测试</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>芯片测试中 <strong>检查 LDO 电压（Low Dropout Regulator Voltage）</strong> 是一个非常关键的环节，用于验证芯片内部或外部 LDO 是否正常输出稳定的电压，为核心模块提供可靠电源。</p>
<h2 id="1什么是-ldo-电压测试">1.什么是 LDO 电压测试</h2>
<p><strong>LDO（低压差线性稳压器）</strong> 通常存在于芯片内部，用于将外部较高电压（如 3.3V）降为内部工作电压（如 1.8V 或 1.2V）。LDO 电压测试的目的是：</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>检查 LDO 是否正常启动</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>测量其输出是否在规格范围内（例如 1.8V ± 5%）</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>验证不同负载、不同电源条件下的稳定性</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="2ldo-电压测试流程">2.LDO 电压测试流程</h2>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202506/2212230-20250625094348509-189177948.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h2 id="3ni-推荐设备">3.NI 推荐设备</h2>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202506/2212230-20250625094509965-409839000.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h2 id="4测试连接结构示意">4.测试连接结构示意</h2>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202506/2212230-20250625094605342-1669690696.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h2 id="5测试注意事项">5.测试注意事项</h2>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202506/2212230-20250625094740237-1466594651.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h2 id="6总结">6.总结</h2>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202506/2212230-20250625094821441-754993446.png" class="lazyload"></p>
